title: (x) "Shriners" serif face, NOT Proforma - Melior {Stephen}
content:
ok got this all working now...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808134314im_/http:/typophile.com/files/whatdafont.jpg)

Any idea as to what font this is?

also just curious.. I had 39 projects yesterday.. 32 of them logo sizing and emailing logos... 6 of them complete typesetting and 3 of them were complete recreations of logos with typesetting... Am I being abused??? I don’t work for myself..

 [‹ (x) Recipe titles in Balthazar Cookbook - Bureau Grotesque {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808134314/http:/typophile.com/node/19228 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Johnny's" kinda ugly brush script - LP Spring {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808134314/http:/typophile.com/node/19227 "Go to next forum topic")
author: amiart

comments.content: Try giving your sample a unique name. You’re seeing a different image because you accidentally gave it the same name as a sample that has been uploaded previously by someone else.

Found it...

http://www.myfonts.com/PurchaseOptions?ids[family]=2692

URW Latino ..

Thank you
